alerts.title: alerts
alerts.description: Use Alerts pattern to notify user about any state change in your application. The change of state can be informational, success event, failure event or of warning in nature. By default, alerts shows a state associated icon and a close button to terminate alert message. Both of which can be configured not to display. Finally, you also configure alerts take lesser or greater space in your layout based upon your visual design needs.

section.title: States
section.description: Default alert notification state is error; you can change it to be either informational, success or warning.
